mapper.insert: insert into board (board_num, user_id, title, content, inputdate, hits) values (board_num_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select:
select * from board
where title like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
order by board_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into reply (replynum, board_num, user_id, commentt, inputdate) values (replynum_seq.nextval, #{board_num}, #{user_id}, #{commentt}, sysdate)
mapper.select:
select count(*) from board
where title like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
